product_name: Sierra Designs Frequency Fleece Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Made from adaptable microfleece, the women's Sierra Designs Frequency Jacket can be worn against skin as a base layer or layered as quick-drying insulation for aerobic sports. Reverse coil zipper and flatlock seams keep cool air out. Thumbholes extend sleeve coverage over the hands. The Sierra Designs Frequency Jacket for women has hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Made from adaptable microfleece, the women's Sierra Designs Frequency Jacket can be worn against skin as a base layer or layered as quick-drying insulation for aerobic sports.
